[Government](https://www.cityofcarrollton.com/government)

Mayor & City Council
====================

[Font Size:](javascript:void(0); "default font size")
[+](javascript:void(0); "larger font size")
[-](javascript:void(0); "smaller font size")

[Share & Bookmark](javascript:void(0); "Click to expand Share & Bookmark options")
Share & Bookmark, Press Enter to show all options, press Tab go to next option

* [Facebook](javascript:shareLink('facebook') "Click to share with Facebook")
* [LinkedIn](javascript:shareLink('linkedin') "Click to share with LinkedIn")
* [Twitter](javascript:shareLink('twitter') "Click to share with Twitter")
* [Reddit](javascript:shareLink('reddit') "Click to share with Reddit")

[Feedback](javascript:void(0); "Click to submit an email to feedback")
[Print](javascript:window.print(); "Click to print this page")





### The City of Carrollton is a Home Rule municipality with a council-manager form of government. The City Council is made up of a mayor and seven councilmembers.

All members of the Council are elected at-large and serve three-year staggered terms. They are community volunteers who meet in regular meetings twice a month.  
  
The role of the Mayor and City Council is to enact local legislation, provide vision for the future of Carrollton, set policy, and hire a City Manager.

![cityhall-government@2x](https://www.cityofcarrollton.com/home/showpublishedimage/24971/637798505059130000)Meetings

City Council meetings are generally held the first and third Tuesday of each month in the City Council Chamber on the second floor of [City Hall](https://www.cityofcarrollton.com/?splash=https%3a%2f%2fwww.google.com%2fmaps%2fplace%2f1945%2bE%2bJackson%2bRd%2c%2bCarrollton%2c%2bTX%2b75006%2f%4032.9763223%2c-96.891328%2c17z%2fdata%3d!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x864c267782698837%3a0xfb9c4aa7295a3e61!8m2!3d32.9763178!4d-96.8891393&____isexternal=true): 1945 E. Jackson Rd. Carrollton, TX 75006.

The Worksession will begin at 5:45 p.m. with Regular Session immediately following.

![map-location@2x](https://www.cityofcarrollton.com/home/showpublishedimage/24997/637798505643770000)Place Boundaries

* The **Mayor** and **Council** **Places 2, 4,** and **6** are elected at-large and may reside anywhere in the City of Carrollton.
* **Council Places 1, 3, 5,** and **7** are elected and must reside within the boundaries of their respective Place.

[Interactive Boundary Map](https://www.cityofcarrollton.com/home/showpublisheddocument/13072/635974896850130000)




---

### Council Goals

City Council reviews the Council Goals at the Strategic Planning Session every summer.
